forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. High 13C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Becoming windy late. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy overnight. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.
